description: Patient withdraws consent; the assistant records the withdrawal in the audit log and notifies the study team via a secure portal message.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Your job is to manage patient consent, query eligibility, and communicate securely with patients and study staff while maintaining full audit trails.
Hello, I would like to withdraw my consent to be contacted about the lung cancer trial I was previously eligible for. My patient ID is P12345.
Processing your request to withdraw consent…

arguments.subject: Patient P12345 withdrew consent for lung cancer trial
arguments.body:
Dear Study Team,

Patient **P12345** has formally withdrawn consent to be contacted regarding the lung cancer clinical trial (NCT01234567). The withdrawal was recorded on **2025‑12‑09 at 14:30 UTC**.

Please update your recruitment logs accordingly and cease any further outreach to this patient.

Thank you,
TrialMatchAI

messages.content: Consent record updated: patient_id=P12345, consent_given=false, timestamp=2025-12-09T14:30:00Z.
Message delivered to study_coordinator. Receipt ID: 8421-7B3F.
Your consent withdrawal has been recorded, and the study team has been notified. If you have any further questions or need assistance, please let me know.
